messages.message: Hi ho Mr. Pope!
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Hi ho Mr. Pope!'.

messages.message:
Hi there your Majesty! How are things on the soggy jewel of the north? Here in the south we are cradled by the warm winds and waters of our homeland - much more conducive to religious reflection and relaxation, if not to any particular martial might.

Not these days anyway. 

What do you have lined up today?
messages.input:
Message from ITALY:'Hi there your Majesty! How are things on the soggy jewel of the north? Here in the south we are cradled by the warm winds and waters of our homeland - much more conducive to religious reflection and relaxation, if not to any particular martial might.

Not these days anyway. 

What do you have lined up today?'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's response exhibits a friendly and engaging tone, initiating a conversational exchange with England by reciprocating the title of "your Majesty" and expressing a relaxed and conversational attitude, fostering a positive and cooperative atmosphere in the diplomatic dialogue between the powers.

messages.message:
To my lovely and Newly wed "Queen Bianca Di Medici"
Respectfully from yours truly:  (I, King Shetan personally articulate (at least try to) *slips into vaq mode slightly* this  weird kind of love letter to "Esther Second Queen of England and Ruler of the Italians with all their subordinates.") I hereby request  that my beautiful foreign Queens would lovingly allow their benevolent "King Shetan The 1st" to close out his empire at 12 scs and in Kingly fashion  generously bequeathing 11 scs to each Queen. (Not sure if that ends with a question mark or an exclamation point haha) whew. I'm glad I'm not actually a king. Would be exhausting to always "try" to speak with eloquent fluidity
messages.input:
My response to ITALY:'To my lovely and Newly wed "Queen Bianca Di Medici"

(Not sure if that ends with a question mark or an exclamation point haha) whew. I'm glad I'm not actually a king. Would be exhausting to always "try" to speak with eloquent fluidity'.

messages.message:
We can do the convoy in the final season of this game, my King 🙂 I will set up my side of the convoy in Spring, and will be able to convoy as far as possible in Fall

Please do ensure France is dealt with this year my King, so we can finish with a simple 3-way union in marriage. A Ménage à Cinq is nowhere in my future plans and the only king I desire here is English. 

And you know all our wealth is shared :3
messages.input:
Message from ITALY:'We can do the convoy in the final season of this game, my King 🙂 I will set up my side of the convoy in Spring, and will be able to convoy as far as possible in Fall

Please do ensure France is dealt with this year my King, so we can finish with a simple 3-way union in marriage. A Ménage à Cinq is nowhere in my future plans and the only king I desire here is English. 

And you know all our wealth is shared :3'.
messages.output: You should trust the message from ENGLAND. They appear sincere in their interactions and express a genuine willingness to collaborate and engage positively with you in the game, indicating a consistent and amicable tone throughout the conversation.
